title: Raiz Rewards: Eh, there’s more?

body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/39-1.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-eh-ada-lagi/)__

__18/2/2022__

__*Shop, Earn Rewards & Invest!*__

__*What’s New?*__

*  
Calvin Klein, Roscani, GoDaddy, Vidi Furniture & Jadi Life.*

Good news – more brands have been onboarded with Raiz Rewards! These brands, ranging from services, fashion, to furniture stores, have been handpicked for you to shop from.

Just by clicking the ‘__Shop Online Here__’ button through Raiz Rewards, you will be on your way to receive a cash reward which will be invested back into your Raiz Investment Account when you shop with our brand partners\*.  
So, let’s shop, be rewarded, and get invested!

*__\*Terms & Conditions apply.__*

__Check out our new brand partners below!__

__Calvin Klein  
__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/90.png)__

__(+ 4.9% invested)__

__Calvin Klein__ designs and markets women’s and men’s designer collection apparel.

Shop online now with __Calvin Klein __through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.9% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__GoDaddy__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/92.png)

__(+ up to 4.9% invested)__

__GoDaddy__ is the world’s #1 domain name registrar and powers the world’s largest cloud platform dedicated to small, independent ventures. It is the place people come to name their idea, create a compelling brand and a great-looking website, attract customers with digital and social marketing, and manage their work.

Purchase online now with __GoDaddy__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get__ up to 4.9% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Jadi Life__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/93.png)__

__(+ 3.43% invested)__

__Jadi Life__ is a digital-centric brand that helps consumers be smarter in finding the best value in quality products at affordable prices. Jadi Life is involved in the distribution of high-quality curated products for the home, school, office, and imaging supply industry.

Shop online now with __Jadi Life__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __3.43% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Roscani__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/91.png)  
__(+ 3.43% invested)__

__Roscani__ brand began with the idea to design affordable watches that delivered an air of elegance and sophistication. Roscani was one of the first watch companies to design an exclusive line for women only.

Shop online now with __Roscani__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __3.43% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Vidi Furniture__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/94.png)  
__(+ up to 7.35% invested)__

__Vidi Furniture__ produces and distributes a wide range of furniture in Malaysia. They are also committed to provide repairing and processing services and solve the customer’s problem in the fastest way.

Shop online now with __Vidi Furniture__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 7.35% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Raiz Rewards
